h1. Desktop Deck

Activate your early access trial to your Desktop Deck and access desktop applications on any of your html5 compatible devices.

{{ contact_form: receiver_email:support@mothership1.com | custom | subject: Activation Desktop Deck Request  }}
    {{html: <input type="hidden" name="sender_email" required value="{[currentUser.emailaddresses[0] ]}" />}}
    {{html: <input type="hidden" name="sender_name" required value="{[currentUser.username]}" />}}
    {{html: <input type="hidden" name="body" required value="Activate Desktop Decks" />}}

    {{div3: class=form-group }}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-2" for="num_users">Number of users</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-5}}
            {{html: <input type="number" required class="form-control inputStyle" name="num_users" />}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}

    {{div3: class=form-group }}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-2" for="capacity">Data capacity needed per user in GB</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-5}}
            {{html: <input type="number" required class="form-control inputStyle" name="capacity" />}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}

    {{div3: class=form-group }}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-2" for="interests">Interested to use for</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-5}}
            {{dropdown: name=interests | id=multiple_options | multiple
                * MS Office
                * Free Office Tools
                * Linux Desktop Apps
                * Legacy Apps
                * Cloud Drive
            }}
       {{div4}}
    {{div3}}

    {{div3: class=form-group }}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-2" for="other_interests">Other applications I am looking for</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-5 areaStyle}}
            {{ textarea: rows=10 | cols=20 | required | name=other_interests | class=form-control}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}

    {{div3: class=form-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-2"></label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-5}}
            {{ submit: class=btn btn-primary | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
                {{html: Activate}}
            {{submit}}

            {{ reset }}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}
{{ contact_form }}
